snippet.title: Penny Blood - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Our mysterious protagonist Matthew Farrell approaches Golgotha Asylum, does battle with a Maliferous Patient, and uses his Fusion ability to defeat the dreaded Motofuji. #PennyBlood

Back the Kickstarter! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/doublekickstarter/armed-fantasia-and-penny-blood?fbclid=IwAR2ghYBsSjBT4vBlWf7zdPMFulyWWmf9Kw9f-KiLdBVGgna9lkdrjJFzU1U

Circumnavigate the globe, from USA to Europe and Asia, and explore nations either recovering or basking in the wake of one of history's bloodiest conflicts, oblivious to the turmoil that brews beneath the surface.

Choose wisely and train your trigger finger with the Psycho Sigil battle system which pairs classic JRPG turn-based battles with intense real-time action.

Penny Blood promises to sink its claws into you as it revives the darker side of Japanese RPGs, with direction from Matsuzo Machida, character design by Miyako Kato and music and sound composed by Yoshitaka Hirota and Akari Kaida!

#PennyBlood
#bloodforblood
